about_the_game:
The Digital Artbook of SoulSet, containing 90 pages (!) of goodness!

Within, you will find all of the finished art pieces for the game as well as rough sketches, design notes and maybe a few little secrets from SoulSet's 'backstage'!

A Wallpaper Pack is included with the artbook as a bonus.
Wallpaper Resolution: 1920x1080

NOTE: It is advised to view the artbook after finishing the game. The content inside contains spoilers (obviously)!

NOTE 2: The artbook is in .pdf format. You can view it on your PC, from within the game files on your hard drive, where your Steam is installed (SteamApps -> common -> SoulSet)

content_descriptors.notes: Some of the pages in the Artbook depict partial nudity and implications of sexual nature.
